pkgmetadata.longdescription: Fast Estimators for Design-Based Inference // Fast procedures for small set of commonly-used, design-appropriate estimators with robust standard errors and confidence intervals. Includes estimators for linear regression, regression improving precision of experimental estimates by interacting treatment with centered pre-treatment covariates introduced by Lin (2013) doi:10.1214/12-AOAS583, difference-in-means, and Horvitz- Thompson estimation.
